about.mainTitle: Bestron Technology, yüksek teknoloji odaklı bir Ar-Ge ve ürün geliştirme firmasıdır.
about.description1: Elektronik tasarım, gömülü sistemler, web ve mobil yazılım ile mekanik mühendislik disiplinlerini bir araya getirerek, talep eden firmalara özel çözümler sunmaktadır.
about.description2: 2016 yılında bir ortak girişimcilik ile başlayan şirket, 2024 yılının başında Bestron Technology adıyla İstanbul Ticaret Odası'na kayıtlı olarak resmî faaliyetlerine başlamıştır.
about.description3: "Hayalleri gerçeğe dönüştüren firma" sloganıyla yola çıkan Bestron Technology, ister yenilikçi fikirler ister piyasadaki ürünler olsun, müşterilerinin projelerine bilgi birikimi ve deneyimiyle değer katmayı hedefler. Ve piyasa analizleri, tersine mühendislik ve ürün incelemeleri ile TÜBİTAK ve KOSGEB danışmanlık hizmetleri sunarak, müşterilerinin stratejik ve teknolojik hedeflerine ulaşmalarına destek olur.
about.section2Title: Bestron Technology, müşterilerinin başarılarından ilham alarak sürekli gelişimi hedefler.
about.section2Desc1: Müşteri portföyümüzde kendi sektörlerinde lider firmalar yer alır ve bizce lider olmak, sadece konumla değil, sürekli daha iyiyi aramakla ilgilidir. Mevcut başarıya rağmen durmamak ve sürekli ilerlemeyi sağlamak temel yaklaşımımızdır.
about.section2Intro: Bunun yanı sıra şu prensiplere özenle bağlıyız:
principles: Müşterilerimizin iş süreçlerine katma değer sağlamak,
Üstlendiğimiz her projede mükemmelliği hedefleyerek özveriyle çalışmak,
Müşteri bilgilerini ve projelerini her zaman gizlilik ve güvenlik önceliğiyle yönetmek,
Projelerde kalite, maliyet ve performans dengesini gözeterek en güncel teknolojileri uygun bileşenlerle tercih etmek.
about.section2Desc2: Müşterilerimizin beklentilerini karşılamak için hem uluslararası standartlara uygun hem de yerel koşullara adapte edilebilir çözümler sunuyor, deneyimimiz ve yaratıcı yöntemlerimizle başarıya ulaşmalarını sağlıyoruz.

vision.title: Vizyon
vision.text: Bestron Technology'nin vizyonu, yenilikçi mühendislik çözümleriyle müşterilerinin ihtiyaçlarını en üst düzeyde karşılayarak teknoloji alanında öncü bir konuma ulaşmaktır.

mission.title: Misyon
mission.text: Bestron Technology'nin misyonu, müşterilerinin iş süreçlerine değer katan, yenilikçi ve uygulanabilir mühendislik çözümleri geliştirmektir. Her projede mükemmelliği hedefleyerek özveriyle çalışmayı, müşteri bilgilerinin gizliliği ve güvenliğini en yüksek düzeyde korumayı temel ilke edinir. Ayrıca, kalite, maliyet ve performans dengesini gözeterek en güncel teknolojileri uygun bileşenlerle bir araya getirip sürdürülebilir ve verimli çözümler sunmayı amaçlar.

team.title: Takım
team.text1: Bestron Technology, alanında uzman mühendislerden oluşan güçlü bir kadroya sahiptir. Her projede, proje ihtiyaçlarına en uygun yetkinliklere sahip mühendislerden oluşan özel ekipler kurulur. Deneyimli bir proje yöneticisi liderliğinde disiplinler arası ekipler yapılandırılır ve proje süreci baştan sona profesyonel bir şekilde yönetilir.
team.text2: Akademik kadromuz, projelere sağladığı danışmanlık desteğiyle inovasyon kapasitemizi bir üst seviyeye taşır.

rdSection.intro: Bestron Technology stands by its customers in all processes, from concept phase to mass production, to bring innovative ideas to life. The services we offer in this scope are:
services: Web, mobile, and cloud-based software development
rdSection.conclusion: Each project is carried out by a specialized engineering team tailored to the needs and optimized according to technical requirements.

manufacturingSection.title: Manufacturing & Process Management
manufacturingSection.intro: Bestron Technology actively participates in all stages up to manufacturing and optimizes production processes in terms of quality, cost and time. The services we offer in this scope are:

Mass production management and quality control processes
Post-production testing, calibration and technical documentation

items.title: DFM (Design for Manufacturability)
items.description: PCB layout, material and component selection and manufacturing defect risks are optimized to enable fast, easy and cost-effective production of the product in the manufacturing process.

items.description: It is designed to increase the testability of the product after production; test points, measurement ease and compatibility with automatic test equipment are taken into account. Thanks to these approaches, production and testing processes are accelerated, error rates are reduced and cost efficiency is achieved.

Tracking of application and evaluation processes
Technical and administrative reporting during the project
tubitakSection.conclusion: Thus, our customers are enabled to benefit most effectively from government supports while realizing their technological visions.

footer.companyDescription: Bestron Technology is an R&D and product development company focused on high technology. It offers specialized solutions to demanding companies by bringing together electronic design, embedded systems, web and mobile software, and mechanical engineering disciplines.

about.mainTitle: Bestron Technology is a high technology-focused R&D and product development company.
about.description1: By bringing together electronic design, embedded systems, web and mobile software, and mechanical engineering disciplines, it offers special solutions to demanding companies.
about.description2: The company, which started as a joint venture in 2016, officially began its operations by registering with the Istanbul Chamber of Commerce under the name Bestron Technology at the beginning of 2024.
about.description3: Bestron Technology, which set out with the slogan "The company that turns dreams into reality", aims to add value to its customers' projects with its knowledge and experience, whether innovative ideas or products in the market. And by providing TÜBİTAK and KOSGEB consulting services with market analysis, reverse engineering and product reviews, it supports its customers to reach their strategic and technological goals.
about.section2Title: Bestron Technology aims for continuous development by taking inspiration from the successes of its customers.
about.section2Desc1: Leading companies in their sectors are in our customer portfolio, and we believe that being a leader is not just about position, but about constantly seeking better. Not stopping despite existing success and ensuring continuous progress is our basic approach.
about.section2Intro: In addition to this, we carefully adhere to the following principles:
principles: Adding value to our customers' business processes,
Working with dedication by aiming for excellence in every project we undertake,
Always managing customer information and projects with priority of confidentiality and security,
Preferring the most up-to-date technologies with appropriate components by considering the balance of quality, cost and performance in projects.
about.section2Desc2: We provide solutions that are both compatible with international standards and adaptable to local conditions to meet our customers' expectations, and ensure their success with our experience and creative methods.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: Bestron Technology's vision is to reach a leading position in the technology field by meeting the needs of its customers at the highest level with innovative engineering solutions.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: Bestron Technology's mission is to develop innovative and applicable engineering solutions that add value to customers' business processes. It adopts as a fundamental principle working with dedication by aiming for excellence in every project, protecting the confidentiality and security of customer information at the highest level. It also aims to bring together the most up-to-date technologies with appropriate components by considering the balance of quality, cost and performance, and to offer sustainable and efficient solutions.

team.title: Team
team.text1: Bestron Technology has a strong team of expert engineers in its field. For each project, special teams consisting of engineers with the most suitable competencies are formed according to project needs. Interdisciplinary teams are structured under the leadership of an experienced project manager, and the project process is managed professionally from start to finish.
team.text2: Our academic staff takes our innovation capacity to the next level with the consultancy support they provide to projects.

Und durch die Bereitstellung von TÜBİTAK- und KOSGEB-Beratungsdiensten mit Marktanalyse, Reverse Engineering und Produktbewertungen unterstützt es seine Kunden dabei, ihre strategischen und technologischen Ziele zu erreichen.
about.section2Title: Bestron Technology strebt kontinuierliche Entwicklung an, indem es sich von den Erfolgen seiner Kunden inspirieren lässt.
about.section2Desc1: Führende Unternehmen in ihren Branchen befinden sich in unserem Kundenportfolio, und wir glauben, dass Führung nicht nur mit der Position, sondern mit dem ständigen Streben nach dem Besseren zu tun hat. Trotz bestehender Erfolge nicht stehen zu bleiben und kontinuierlichen Fortschritt zu gewährleisten, ist unser grundlegender Ansatz.
about.section2Intro: Darüber hinaus halten wir uns sorgfältig an folgende Grundsätze:
principles: Wertschöpfung für die Geschäftsprozesse unserer Kunden,
Mit Hingabe arbeiten, indem wir Exzellenz in jedem Projekt anstreben, das wir übernehmen,
Kundeninformationen und -projekte immer mit Priorität auf Vertraulichkeit und Sicherheit verwalten,
Die neuesten Technologien mit geeigneten Komponenten bevorzugen, indem wir das Gleichgewicht zwischen Qualität, Kosten und Leistung in Projekten berücksichtigen.
about.section2Desc2: Wir bieten Lösungen an, die sowohl mit internationalen Standards kompatibel als auch an lokale Bedingungen anpassbar sind, um die Erwartungen unserer Kunden zu erfüllen, und stellen ihren Erfolg mit unserer Erfahrung und kreativen Methoden sicher.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: Bestron Technologys Vision ist es, eine führende Position im Technologiebereich zu erreichen, indem wir die Bedürfnisse unserer Kunden auf höchstem Niveau mit innovativen Ingenieurslösungen erfüllen.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: Bestron Technologys Mission ist es, innovative und anwendbare Ingenieurslösungen zu entwickeln, die den Geschäftsprozessen der Kunden Mehrwert verleihen. Es macht es sich zum Grundprinzip, mit Hingabe zu arbeiten, indem es Exzellenz in jedem Projekt anstrebt und die Vertraulichkeit und Sicherheit von Kundeninformationen auf höchstem Niveau schützt. Darüber hinaus zielt es darauf ab, die neuesten Technologien mit geeigneten Komponenten zusammenzubringen, indem es das Gleichgewicht zwischen Qualität, Kosten und Leistung berücksichtigt, und nachhaltige und effiziente Lösungen anzubieten.

team.title: Team
team.text1: Bestron Technology verfügt über ein starkes Team von Fachexperten auf seinem Gebiet. Für jedes Projekt werden spezielle Teams aus Ingenieuren mit den am besten geeigneten Kompetenzen gebildet. Interdisziplinäre Teams werden unter der Leitung eines erfahrenen Projektmanagers strukturiert und der Projektprozess wird von Anfang bis Ende professionell verwaltet.
team.text2: Unser akademisches Personal bringt unsere Innovationskapazität mit der Beratungsunterstützung, die es für Projekte bietet, auf die nächste Stufe.
